I love that idea! A bright yellow tank top could be a great addition to Outfit 3. The key is to balance out the boldness of the yellow with the other pieces in the outfit.

Here's how I think it could work:

* The bright yellow tank top will create a fun, playful contrast with the mint green sneakers. The two bold colors will draw attention to your lower half, so make sure you're comfortable with that.
* The olive green pants will provide a nice neutral background that will help to ground the outfit and prevent it from feeling too loud. The earthy tone of the olive green will also complement the bright yellow and mint green nicely.
* The neutral-colored cardigan or sweater will add a layer of sophistication and help to tone down the boldness of the yellow and green. You can wear it open or tied around your waist, depending on the temperature and your personal style.

To make this outfit work, I'd suggest a few things:

* Keep the rest of the outfit simple and understated. Avoid adding too many bold accessories or patterns, as they might clash with the yellow and green.
* Make sure the bright yellow tank top is fitted and not too loose or baggy. You want to look polished and put-together, even in a casual outfit.
* Consider adding some neutral-colored accessories, like a pair of sunglasses or a simple watch, to help tie the outfit together.

Overall, I think a bright yellow tank top could be a great addition to Outfit 3. It'll add a fun pop of color and create a unique, eye-catching look. Just remember to balance it out with the other pieces in the outfit, and you'll be golden!
